name: adrenaline-orb
effect: Makes wild Pokémon more likely to summon allies.  Held: increases the holder's Speed by one stage when affected by Intimidate.
short_effect: Makes wild Pokémon more likely to summon allies.  Held: increases the holder's Speed by one stage when affected by Intimidate.

flavor_text_entries.sun-moon:
Using it makes wild Pokémon more likely to call for
help. If held by a Pokémon, it boosts Speed when
intimidated. It can be used only once.
flavor_text_entries.ultra-sun-ultra-moon:
Using it makes wild Pokémon call for help a number
of times. If held by a Pokémon, it boosts Speed
when intimidated. It can be used only once.
flavor_text_entries.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee:
Using it makes wild Pokémon call for help a number
of times. If held by a Pokémon, it boosts Speed
when intimidated. It can be used only once.
flavor_text_entries.sword-shield:
If held by a Pokémon, it boosts Speed
when intimidated.
